headline: First Solar (NasdaqGS:FSLR) Revises 2025 Earnings Guidance Downward
summary: First Solar (NasdaqGS:FSLR) recently experienced an 11% price increase over the last quarter. This movement coincides with various developments, including the company's partnership with Shoals Technologies Group, which aims to bolster domestic manufacturing and enhance supply chains in the U.S. solar industry. Despite this progress, First Solar revised its 2025 earnings guidance downward, citing challenges that may have influenced its stock performance. In the broader market context,...

headline: Trump’s Tax Megabill Has Analysts Souring on Sunrun, First Solar, Enphase Stocks
summary: The residential solar sector looks to fight for its survival, as the Senate didn't significantly water down Trump's tax bill.

headline: First Solar Scales U.S. Manufacturing to Meet Rising Demand
summary: FSLR aims at expanding U.S. manufacturing with two new plants as it targets 14 GW capacity to meet surging solar demand by 2026.

headline: First Solar: 3 Reasons To Be Contrarian
summary: First Solar's unique CdTe thin-film technology provides supply chain resilience and independence from Chinese crystalline silicon, reducing tariff risk. Learn more on FSLR stock here.
